name: Zombie Car Survival
description:
Its never been more fun to kill zombies!

In this new addictive gameplay you will need to survive and kill as much zombies as possible.

You will be able to:

- Upgrade your weapon to kill faster

- Improve your driving skills to survive longer

- Buy new and better cars in the garage

- Progress through endless levels and discover the city as you drive away!


Addictive new car gameplay that will keep you playing for hours.
